Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted & 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 79th/Ashland
ShortDescription: WB 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Ashland, 76th, Damen, then resume their normal route on 79h, due to fire department activity nr 79th/Ashland

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Ashland, 76th, Damen, then resume their normal route on 79h, due to fire department activity near 79th/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.
